competitors.notes: Founded 2005, two years before Dropbox, enterprise-focused

competitors.name: Microsoft OneDrive
competitors.notes: Released in 2007, same year as Dropbox founded

competitors.name: Google

context: Dropbox, Inc. is a cloud storage and collaboration platform focused on file sync, sharing, and team collaboration tools. Founded. Pioneered consumer cloud file sync.
